[`EditorSuggestTriggerInfo`](EditorSuggestTriggerInfo.md)

## EditorSuggestTriggerInfo interface


**Signature:**

```typescript
export interface EditorSuggestTriggerInfo 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [`end`](EditorSuggestTriggerInfo.end.md) |  | [`EditorPosition`](EditorPosition.md) | The end position of the triggering text. This is used to position the popover. |
|  [`query`](EditorSuggestTriggerInfo.query.md) |  | <code>string</code> | They query string (usually the text between start and end) that will be used to generate the suggestion content. |
|  [`start`](EditorSuggestTriggerInfo.start.md) |  | [`EditorPosition`](EditorPosition.md) | The start position of the triggering text. This is used to position the popover. |
